sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_secrets.SecretsManagementUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SecretsManagementUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SecretsManagementUtils = Class.create();
SecretsManagementUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    getPassword2Tables: function() {
        var tables = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
        tables.addEncodedQuery("internal_type=password2");
        tables.query();
        var tablesMap = {};
        var encodedQuery = "";
        while (tables.next()) {
            if (!tablesMap[tables.name]) {
                tablesMap[tables.name] = 1;
                if (encodedQuery == "")
                    encodedQuery += "name=" + tables.name;
                else
                    encodedQuery += "^ORname=" + tables.name;
            }
        }
        return encodedQuery;
    },getPassword2Packages: function () {
        var packages = new GlideRecord ("sys_kmf_crypto_module") ;
		//fetching cm glide encrypter (password2 sub modules)
        packages.addQuery("parent_crypto_module","7d7ee9e3b7030010ebf7082e7e11a979" );
		//removing instance level glide encrypter
		packages.addQuery("sys_id","!=","401fa53c5b6220106cdba88ddc81c754");
        packages.query();
        var encodedQuery = "";
        while (packages.next()) {
           if (encodedQuery == "")
               encodedQuery += "sys_id=" + packages.sys_package;
            else
               encodedQuery += "^ORsys_id=" + packages.sys_package;
        }
        return encodedQuery;
    },
  type: 'SecretsManagementUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-09 06:28:12</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>51d6cab077320110d21bd84b8c5a9984</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SecretsManagementUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow Secrets Management" source="sn_secrets">b64eaff0771101101f3dcffbae5a998b</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow Secrets Management">b64eaff0771101101f3dcffbae5a998b</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_51d6cab077320110d21bd84b8c5a9984</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-09 06:28:12</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
